General.Name: Chongqing New Dazheng Property Grp
General.Description: New Dazheng Property Group Co., Ltd., an independent third-party property service company, provides property services for various urban public buildings focusing on smart city public buildings and facilities in China. The company offers property management services; and professional management and value-added services. It provides property services for school, public, aviation, office, and commercial and residential properties, as well as venues, and other urban public buildings and facilities. New Dazheng Property Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Chongqing, China.
